name: You vs. Wild
summary: 观看这部交互式剧集时，你将做出关键决定，帮助贝尔·格里尔斯在地球上最严酷的环境里好好活下来，并完成任务。
info:
• 中文名: 你的荒野求生
  • 放送星期: 星期三
  • 别名: 你与荒野
  • 集数: 8
  • 开始: 2019-04-10
  • 结束: 2019-04-10
  • 类型: 真人秀
  • 国家/地区: 美国
  • 语言: 英语
  • 电视网: NETFLIX
  • 台湾名称: 贝尔对战荒野
  • 港澳名称: 野外求生預埋你
  • 官方网站: https://www.netflix.com/title/80227574
  • imdb_id: tt10044952
  • 主演: Bear Grylls

eps.name: Operation Jungle Rescue, Pt. 1
eps.desc: A doctor on a mission to deliver malaria vaccines to children is missing in the jungle, and it's up to you to help Bear find her.

eps.name: Operation Jungle Rescue, Pt. 2
eps.desc: Bear needs to travel 27 miles through the thick Central American jungle to deliver medicine to a remote village. But he can't get there without you.

eps.name: Searching for a Saint Bernard
eps.desc: Deep snow, crevasses and avalanches are just some of the threats Bear will face when you help him locate a lost rescue dog in the Swiss Alps.

eps.name: Lost on Snow Mountain
eps.desc: Bear must survive for 24 hours on a frigid mountain pass in the Swiss Alps until help can arrive. Should he stay put or stay moving? It's your call!

eps.name: A Venomous Adventure, Pt. 1
eps.desc: A cargo plane has crash-landed in a scorching desert canyon, and Bear needs your help to find it. But first, will you put him in a plane or a helicopter?

eps.name: A Venomous Adventure, Pt. 2
eps.desc: Explore the desert as you help Bear comb the unforgiving landscape to acquire the venom of a snake, a scorpion and a tarantula. Can you find all three?

eps.name: Land of the Dragons
eps.desc: Stranded on the cliffs above a rocky coastline, Bear has to make his way miles inland through a dense forest to safety -- all with your assistance.

eps.name: Myth of the Abandoned Mine
eps.desc: Bear is dropped into a remote European wilderness near an old mining town. Can you help him find his way back to civilization?
